In peacetime, we'd just condemn this bridge and start over. It's barely better than a cold swim, if you know what I mean.

But try telling that to my bosses. Actually, speaking of telling things to my bosses...

The {@LinkCreature:2#1#redcaps} stole the parts I was supposed to use for the bridge undercarriage...and probably broke them. Will you retrieve the bridge parts and bring them to Niklas, the foreman at Faevine Vale Camp? He can get replacements, and I'd rather not ask Balter.

Why would redcaps steal the parts? What was Siravon doing, if not watching the very parts he's supposed to install?

Rhetorical question. I already know the answer: He's an idiot.

I guess I'll start repairing these parts. Did I mention that Siravon is an idiot?
The {@LinkCreature:2#1#redcaps} and their faerie friends are out of control! We'll never get the bridge fixed at this rate.
